seo_title: Loom Video Downloader - Free Browser Extension for Chrome & Firefox
seo_description: Easily download videos hosted by loom.com on any website in just a click for convenient offline viewing with this Loom video downloader browser extension.
name: Loom Video Downloader
tagline: Easily download videos hosted by loom.com on any website in just a click for convenient offline viewing
features: One-click download from any video page
100% privacy-friendly – no tracking or data collection
No registration or personal data required
description: Loom Video Downloader is a browser extension for Chrome & Firefox that allows you to easily download videos hosted by loom.com on any website in just a click for convenient offline viewing. Download loom videos from your account where the DL button was removed or download loom videos embedded on other web pages.
troubleshooting_instructions: If the video auto-discovery isn't working, try clicking PLAY on the loom video (sometimes that helps)
Make sure you are on a page with Loom videos
Check that the extension is enabled and pinned to your browser
installation_instructions:
1. Star ⭐ this repository
2. Download the latest version (.zip) from the Releases area
3. Double click the .zip file on your computer to unzip it
4. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/
5. Enable "developer mode" by clicking the toggle switch on the top right
6. Install the 'extension' by clicking "Load unpacked" and choosing the 'extension folder' on your computer (the FOLDER, not the .zip)
7. Pin the extension to chrome by clicking the puzzle looking icon thing and then the 'pin' icon
8. When you click on the extension for the first time, you will need to enter your email & license key associated with the extension
usage_instructions: Navigate to a page where there is a Loom video & click on the extension to see the video details populate
Note: If the video auto-discovery isn't working, try clicking PLAY on the loom video (sometimes that helps)
